data.actual_result: You get jumped to the user's DM without the actions executing
data.expected_result: You stay on the page and the action successfully executes
data.short_description: Buttons for friend requests jumps to a DM with that user and does not deny/accept/cancel as intended (Canary ONLY)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone friend request you or friend request someone else - Go to the "Pending" page - Try to accept/deny the incoming request or cancel the outgoing request - It jumps to a DM without doing the intended action.
